website_summaries.verdict: Well-padded helmet that provides the necessary protection without affecting sight lines.
pros: Padding has anti-microbial properties to resist the formation of odors
Extremely comfortable to wear for the majority of players
Offered in several colors to match your team uniform
Ships with a face mask already attached
Design contains several vents that are well-placed to promote airflow under the helmet
cons: Chin strap snaps may not stay in place if the player pulls on them too hard

customer_reviews.title: The helmet itself is great. The problem I am having is that this ...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself is great. The problem I am having is that this helmet did not come with the snaps that enable to snap a chinstrap to it (even though the picture clearly shows them). This is very frustrating because I cannot find any screw snaps to fit, therefore I cannot attach a chinstrap. DeMarini does not even sell the hardware. We may end up having to get another helmet because of this minor imperfection.
customer_reviews.author: kpeffer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review from a 13 year old girls perspective. I thought the helmet looked nice and what I liked most was the visor seemed to sit higher and shorter than others so she could actually see the ball coming. However, she did not like how it felt and said it was uncomfortable so we returned. We ended up getting an Easton and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachmom

customer_reviews.title: No snaps for chin strap
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. I has no snap for a chin strap, but it does have a threaded hole to install snaps. Also no chin strap comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 of the exact same color and style along ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of the exact same color and style along as being the same size... however one helmet is larger than the other and they are both from the same lot number as well.. so buying from here your taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my niece. Little league. She hasn’t complained about wearing this helmet. The fit was perfect and since she hadn’t complained I’m assuming that it’s very comfortable. It made it through the season with no cracks or breaks.
customer_reviews.author: JanetP

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with damage.
customer_reviews.text: Just received and it seems to be a decent helmet but it arrived damaged. I'm sure my kid will scratch and ding it up with use but I am very disappointed that it came out of the box this way. The damage across the visor is pretty sharp. I'll probably need to file it down.
customer_reviews.author: Pontiff

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured/described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this helmet because my daughter needs a chin strap this year. This helmet did NOT come as pictured [with the snap post]. The tag also does not include the word "Pro" as did the description/title of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray helmet pictured with a matte finish that looked very durable. The unit I received was a glossy gray which already had a few scuffs which appear to be from the cardboard box it came in. Also, glue was applied in an area not covered by the foam pads, leaving a spot which is destined to collect hair, dirt, and grass.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Tucker

customer_reviews.title: It is not the MATTE color!
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the pictures it is a little deceiving because the color looks flat not shiny. This is not the MATTE, it is more expensive for those, so please do not get fooled.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect⭐ I bought this for my 8 year-old (75lbs & 4'7") she likes her helmet a little loose because she has affordably bigger ears and snug fitting helmets tend to pull and hurt her ears when taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: MellyWhoDo

customer_reviews.title: Really well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd grade baseball. They run alittle bigger than they say. But sniffing that's going to help my son be safe... priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stock

customer_reviews.title: Really nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice helmets, we added an extra pad inside to make it fit better, the smaller size was too small for 8u girls, but the bigger was just a tad too big. The extra pad inside made them fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mommywifelife

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet! Bought this for my 6 yo first ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Bought this for my 6 yo first grade daughter. Fits securely without being too tight on her ears. She wears hearing aids bilaterally, so we have issues finding a good fit in all aspects, but this seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Mondu

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My Nephew loved the helmet. Red is his favorite color. nice and sturdy and not too heavy for a child's head.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son has a bigger head than most kids, and wears adult sizes in hats. This helmet fit him perfectly, is comfortable and the added face mask is great because it’s required in his youth baseball league.
customer_reviews.author: Everest

customer_reviews.title: 14 y/o likes it after month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Average price compared to most stores. My daughter likes it. That’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: gene w mattice

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Looks great! Chin strap sold separately. We don’t use a chinstrap anyways
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Consumer

customer_reviews.title: It came perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect! I was hesitant buying it because I seen reviews saying it was cheaply made, or it arrived damaged. The buttons for the chin strap did come. They just weren’t on the helmet. It came in alittle bag that you have to put on yourself. All you have to do is twist them in like a screw. The holes and threads are already pre installed. It came in perfect condition. Not one scratch. Definitely worth the $35ish bucks!
customer_reviews.author: simplylinda27

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was missing the snaps for a chin strap. The product photo clearly shows the chin strap snaps. Just 2 threaded holes and the helmet was scratched like it was dropped prior to shipping. It’s being returned tomorrow. Not the quality product that I expected from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Damato

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my soon to be 8 year old daughter. I ordered the size sm/med for her. It is a smidge too big but I knew that when ordering. It fits my 9 year old perfectly though. I added vinyl decals to personalize it.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic Szczepanek

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to size. We purchased this for my nephew first year of baseball. And you can decorate it if the coaches let you.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a used helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like used helmet ,the helmet is with a lot dust inside and out side with scratches,
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Required helmet change this year, needed face mark. Fit my 11 year old perfect, can see for batting and doesnt fall off when running. Only negative is sticker on back of helmet, took it off and now sticky and not cute
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for tball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my youngest son to play tball. Fit great, plenty of padding inside. Love that it has a face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a adult or older child. Fits great and is comfortable. As always amazon shipping is fast!
customer_reviews.author: KDavis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Order this size large for my 10year old 4th grader.
customer_reviews.author: KANISHA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing helmet for my 11 year old daughter. Fits awesome and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks safe
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7 year old great (he has a large head and can wear adult hats). I feel so much better since he moved up from t-ball and is playing with bigger kids this year. He's can even wear his glasses now
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected And is high quality! Great value buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ksurnear

customer_reviews.title: Not a very flexible fit
customer_reviews.text: Tough fit for a 12 year old softball player. Also it was quite heavy. Liked the all black color way but size didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Tomasito

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Helmet seems to be comfortable and gives plenty of view.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only style I could find that was small enough for my daughter. Has worked out great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Exner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were pleasantly surprised at how nice and sturdy this helmet it. Protects my daughter well and is very nice in person!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Vance

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, much better than the league supplied helmets
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for softball. Very happy, much better than the league supplied helmets. My son has the same one in a size smaller. We will stick with these, and not switch brands!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Damhoff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted to get.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a good price. Thank you for the prompt delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett Flink

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable out there
customer_reviews.text: Good quality helmet with chin strap. My kids say its one of the most comfortable they have had.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Linkous

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price. Serves purpose. My kid has a small head but it works fine for t ball
customer_reviews.author: somer scarano

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no I’ll effects to him whatsoever good
customer_reviews.text: My son wore this during this season and he was hit twice in the head with a pitch. Absolutely no I’ll effects to him whatsoever good helmet
customer_reviews.author: daniel moore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 12 and it for perfect and it’s very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Pond Works

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helmet fits. Had to make adjustments to the face protector to help slip off easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit & good look
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughter great. Looks nice and fits in her bat bag also.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Conner

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful helmet, fits well but if you have an average sized teenage girl order the X-large! My daughter is 5'6", 15 years old and it fits beautifully. Most of the girls on the team order the same size and they all fit well.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter perfect. She plays high school softball and needed a new helmet. Hard to find one for kids with braids but this helmet fits even with her braids.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but if you got an amazing jaw line made from the gods, beware uncomfortableness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, but disappointed no chin strap came with it. Fits true to size, seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: It not a good for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it,I never use since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: hanlin2747

customer_reviews.title: This helmet is not matte
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering the charcoal grey matte helmet. This is a glossy grey. Very frustrating. Now, I need to return & order another one before my daughter’s tournament on Saturday
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Fits and Works
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son has a very large head. I had trouble finding a helmet for him. This one fits perfect and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Love Being a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as expected, foam padding is a little thin, but protects and fits well. Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Carmel Porras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Fits both my 5 and 8yr old and the 8yr old has a BIG head.
customer_reviews.author: T C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is 6 1/2 and below; however, it is still very large on my 5 and 7 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Welchdpt

customer_reviews.title: Liked I️t
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet with a solid fit and very protective. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a shiny grey not the matter look in the pic
customer_reviews.author: Tvigil

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably and great!!! Better than other brands we have tried
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for fast pitch softball
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the padding and light weight of this batting helmet. Works great and Demarini is a great brand
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Kellar

customer_reviews.title: used for only 5months
customer_reviews.text: only had this helmet for 5 months and padding inside came off and now cant use it have to spend more money on another helmet now
customer_reviews.author: raenette l.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet, our entire travel ball team purchased this helmet and the girls praised how comfortable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Perez

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Did not send the matte finish ....sent us the shiney finish which is not what is pictured
customer_reviews.author: A. Wishart

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Fits nicely and my daughter cannot wait ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Fits nicely and my daughter cannot wait to wear it in a game!!
customer_reviews.author: Illinois buyer

customer_reviews.title: really good for long hair
customer_reviews.text: Quality helmet and fit well for my high school daughter (softball) who has long thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: mitch ridout

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with chin strap but it is not required. Fits my 9 yr old daughter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: fezerado

customer_reviews.title: Just needs chinstrap
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! I just wish it came with a chin strap. But other than that it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Benny Seja Zavala II

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: Finally a helmet that's fits my daughter as it should.she is small and it is hard to find one that fits her.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is lightweight and fits well. Measured my daughter's head at 7" and ordered XL. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chin strap grommet came off during 1st game with helmet.
customer_reviews.text: My son wore this helmet to his first game. At his 2nd time to bat when he took his chin strap off the metal grommet came off. We had already put his name and vinyl on his helmet so we couldn’t return. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kay Heath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for fit for my eight year old with a little room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this helmet. It arrived with dust caked all over it, as if it’s been sitting on a shelf for years. Definitely not in new shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with mask.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is fine nothing wrong. Did not come with the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Les Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this helmet. Doesn't impede her vision as other helmets do
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holmes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the picture the helmet comes with NO SNAP for the required chinstrap. Ordered 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Helmet has been great. the fit was perfect for my daughter. It was shipped and arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Van Houten

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Fast shipping. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JMar

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fits great and has plenty of padding. Removable face guard works great for t-ball. Would definitely recommend and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet
customer_reviews.text: Add your club's logo sticker on the front and the player's number on the back and they are even better!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It was nice just though it wouldn’t be so shiny!!
customer_reviews.author: Serrano

customer_reviews.title: ... phone where the earpieces are we're coming off after like the first or second use
customer_reviews.text: The phone where the earpieces are we're coming off after like the first or second use. They seemed sort of big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits her perfect. She's slammed it a few time and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter. Fits her perfect. She's slammed it a few time and it hasn't damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got the wrong size and ordered the correct size and got it in time for baseball season.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Bach

customer_reviews.title: The helmet itself is great. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself is great. My daughter loves it. Doesn't move up and down when she is running or anything. I gave this 3 stars, because I ordered a charcoal helmet that was the correct color in the picture. When I received it, it was a shiny gray. Not at all like the picture. So now I have to go elsewhere and order another one so that she matches her team. That's what I get for trying to save a few bucks with Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: catj1981

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing
customer_reviews.text: The item description states this will fit 6 7/8" and under but it does not. I received the helmet and it states on the tag that it fits 6 1/2" and under. A 6 1/2 will fit a child with a 20.5 inch head and a 6 7/8 will fit a child with a 21.5 inch head. My daughter has a 21 inch head so I needed this to fit up to a 6 7/8. Waste of time so I guess Im running around town now as we need this right away.
customer_reviews.author: Unschoolmom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is different than picture. In the picture it appears matte black with white accents. In reality it's shiny black/cheap looking plastic with no white accents. The only white is the word DeMarini. It's a lot cheaper looking that I imagined. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't sit right on his head. Maybe his head is too big? Or the helmet is too small?
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well for my child. Size for a 10-12 year old (or a very large younger child).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Gail

customer_reviews.title: ... American Legion 40 game seasons and is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: Has lasted 3 American Legion 40 game seasons and is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: mucka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fit perfectly and has a good snug hold. Good brands name awesome look. Great price.☆☆☆☆☆

product_meta.title: DeMarini Paradox Protege Pro Batting Helmet with Mask
feature_bullets: Dual density padding fitted specifically to your head size
Low profile shell for superior fit
